alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Lake; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 04 at 10:02AM MDT until April 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Minnesota and east central South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
